name: Circus Daddy
description:
It's "bring your kid to work day" at the circus where you work as an acrobat.

You brought your baby girl for tonight's big show.

She might be a bit annoying if you want to do your job properly, as she slips off your hands every time you jump. Be careful, if you drop her : she might get hurt... and her mom won't be happy about it... So you have to do your best to keep her alive for the show must go on.

Controls

WASD/ZQSD : move

SPACEBAR : jump but be careful, the baby will be thrown away

R : bring you back to the latest checkpoint

ESCAPE : toggle fullscreen

Tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.2
  • 3D tools: Blender 2.82    
  • 2D tools: Krita, Gimp

Every asset (except the musics and sounds) has been made during the game jam. We tried to use the most open-source tools as possible. Some of the animations were picked from Mixamo.com.
